meeting_info.organization: Reinvestment Zone Number Eight, City of Dallas, Texas
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6DN Conference Room and Videoconference

presenters: Sue Hounsel, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development
Guy Bruggeman, Public Art Conservation Manager, Office of Arts and Culture

agenda_items.title: Call to order and introduction of meeting participants
Public comments pertaining to agenda items 3 through 5
Review and consider the Meeting Record of the February 12, 2024 Design District TIF District Board Meeting
agenda_items.presenter: Sue Hounsel, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development

agenda_items.title: Review a project update for the Trinity Strand Hi-Line Span Project
agenda_items.description: 1) a pedestrian bridge at the Hi Line Drive trail head to span across Turtle Creek and connector trail segment from the western side of the new bridge to Market Center Boulevard and 2) a connector trail segment from Market Center Boulevard to Irving Boulevard and consider an increase in the district-wide TIF funding by up to an additional $2,722,123 (from the original dedication of $7,000,000) for design and construction for a total not to exceed $9,722,123.
agenda_items.presenter: Sue Hounsel, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development
agenda_items.action_required: Approve and forward a recommendation of approval to City Council

agenda_items.title: Receive informational briefing and discuss a public art component for the Trinity Strand Hi-Line Span Project trailhead/plaza
agenda_items.presenter: Sue Hounsel, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development, Guy Bruggeman, Public Art Conservation Manager, Office of Arts and Culture
agenda_items.action_required: Discuss and provide direction to staff, as applicable

financial_items.description: Increase in the district-wide TIF funding for design and construction
